column1: # Only entries that suzume cannot handle without dictionary:
# - Mixed character type compounds (Web開発, etc.)
# - Fixed expressions with particles (鬼滅の刃, etc.)
# - Words that would be incorrectly split
# Note: 〜らしい patterns (子供らしい, etc.) handled by inflection analyzer
# Common 〜しい adjectives (to distinguish from verb renyokei + そう patterns)
# e.g., 難しそう (adj) vs 話しそう (verb) - both have kanji + し + そう structure
# Note: なかなか, いつも are in L1 adverbs.h
# Note: 非常に, 本当に, etc. handled by L1 na_adjectives.h + に
# Note: Internet slang and emoticons moved to data/user/dictionary.tsv (L3)
# Note: マジか, マジで, ガチで, というか are in adverbs section
# Note: さすが is in L1 na_adjectives.h
柳の下にいつも泥鰌はいない
column3: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはいない
しっぱいはせいこうのはは
さいしょからさいごまで

column1: # Note: Internet-specific nouns and brand names moved to data/user/dictionary.tsv (L3)

column3: しょっきあらいかんそうき

column1: # Note: しばらく is in adverbs section
# These are verb-derived compound nouns that should be in Layer 2
# Note: Simple お/ご + noun patterns (お茶, お水, etc.) handled by prefix joining
# Note: お + verb stem patterns moved to L1 greetings.h
# Note: Basic greetings (こんにちは, ありがとう, etc.) are in L1 greetings.h
# NOTE: High-frequency items moved to L1 (common_vocabulary.h) for tokenization accuracy
# Add additional vocabulary here that doesn't require L1 registration
# Fruits (for すもももももももものうち)
# Cost balanced: higher than formal noun もの (0.3) to prefer particle も between
# Entries migrated from low_info.h (DEPRECATED WASM fallback)
# Common verbs moved to L1 for auto-conjugation
# Auxiliary verbs kept here to avoid conjugation conflicts
# (e.g., ある → あれ conflicts with pronoun あれ)
# Pronoun あれ has lower cost (0.2) to beat verb あれ (imperative of ある)
# Irregular adjective よい (良い) conjugations
# Plural suffixes (複数接尾語) - low cost for NOUN+suffix pattern
# Honorific suffixes (敬称接尾語) - Moved to L1 (low_info.h) as SUFFIX
# さん, 様, ちゃん, くん, etc. are in src/dictionary/entries/low_info.h
# Entries migrated from time_nouns.h (DEPRECATED WASM fallback)
# === 五段ラ行動詞 migrated to L1 (essential_verbs.h) ===
# 対する, 関する, etc. - all moved to L1 for auto-conjugation
